channel.title: Logs on Alejandro M. Andirkó
channel.description: Recent content in Logs on Alejandro M. Andirkó

item.title: Album listening log
item.description: Album listening log Hearing is a labor like reading Hearing is a labor like keeping still The ideal goal is 365 albums at the end of the year. A more realistic figure given past years is between 100 and 200 ambums, when work allows. Depending on the circumstances I might take break periods where I listen to loose songs instead and try and catch up in other weeks.

item.title: Bass exercises
item.description: Bass I’m recording here the progress I do with bass playing. 2022 Goals Improvisation Better understanding and comfort with altered dominant tensions. 20 iterations, all keys. 8/20 it. ████_____ 40% Technical Modal sequences 90 bpm 1/20 it. █_________ 10% Repertoire Fluid walking over the first section of Body and soul. 20 iterations, all keys 0/20 it. _________ 0% Rhythm Polymuting exercise 01. 120 bpm 0/120 it.

item.title: Projects and meta
item.description: Why log? 2022 00F01 Climate change protest action. 00D01 General, ongoing populating the wiki. Started involving myself more in climate change activism. 00C04 Started new job as a developer. 00A00 Started seriously considering logging. Started website revamp. Considered several personal wiki/memex posibilities.

item.title: Reading list
item.description: Books I’ll list here my current reading list. I have to admit it’s not my priority activity these days, prefering music overall. I tend to read essays, not much fiction. I’m also in a strike of eco-related readings right now. I tend to read several things at the same time, and leave and retake topics as my intest demands. I’m currently reading: Dilla Time - Dan Charnas ██______ ~20%
